headline: MAGA Crowd Praises Trumps Endorsing J.D. Vance in Ohio: The Right Choice!
author: John Binder
sentences:
We should forcibly break them up and create more competition in the same way that Teddy Roosevelt created competition in the steel industry.?
Vances speech at the Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC) assailed elected politicians who are helping fund the United States involvement in the Ukraine-Russia conflict even as the U.S.-Mexico border has seen record-breaking illegal immigration and drug trafficking over the last year.

pic.twitter.com/ysbxeUo58i
 Kurt Schlichter (@KurtSchlichter) April 14, 2022
Vances candidacy has represented the populist-nationalist-wing of the GOP with policy prescriptions for reducing the social and market power of giant tech corporations, punishing multinational companies that outsource American jobs, and critiquing the political establishments lust for foreign interventionism.

Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL) wrote that Trump made the right choice!? and that Republicans need [Vance] in Washington to fight back against those who put America last.?
Likewise, Rep. Jim Banks (R-IN)  who also heads the National Republican Study Committee (NRSC)  called on Ohio Republican primary voters to join Trump and back Vance in the race.

Vance, whose best-selling memoir Hillbilly Elegy was adapted into a movie in 2020, received Trumps complete and total endorsement? in the crowded race that also includes former Ohio State Treasurer Josh Mandel, investment banker Mike Gibbons, and former Ohio Republican Party chairwoman Jane Timken.

Josh Hawley (@HawleyMO) April 15, 2022
Republican Bernie Moreno, who dropped out of the race in February, called on GOP primary voters to rally around Vance in an effort to coalesce support against Rep. Tim Ryan (D-OH), the likely Democrat nominee for Senate.

https://t.co/3n20kOcjIN
 Arthur Schwartz (@ArthurSchwartz) April 15, 2022
Nothing would make me happier than @JDVance1 repping my home state of Ohio in the Senate except JD being cloned and JDVance2 running against and crushing Sherrod "Buckeye Bernie" Brown.

[Vance is] strong on the border, tough on crime, understands how to use taxes and tariffs to hold China accountable, will fight to break up Big Tech, and has been a warrior on the rigged and stolen presidential election,? Trump wrote in his endorsement.

One of the biggest ways that the Democrats have failed the working class, have failed the citizens of this country, is that they dont even care about their citizens compared to the illegal aliens flowing across the U.S. southern border,? Vance said.

Vance has even gone after BlackRock, the Wall Street multinational investment firm, for buying up single-family homes across the U.S. at above-market prices, resulting in first-time homeowners and young Americans getting shut out of home ownership.

Political consultant Arthur Schwartz wrote that Vance is the only candidate in the Ohio GOP Senate primary that is pretty much guaranteed to win the general? Conservative Kurt Schlichter similarly heaped praise on Trump for the endorsement.

Lets go @JDVance1 https://t.co/WiDhvDxc6f
 Richard Grenell (@RichardGrenell) April 15, 2022
Other former Trump administration officials like Cliff Sims, Darren Beattie, and Stephen Miller suggested support for the endorsement.

In an exclusive interview with Breitbart News from January, for instance, Vance said Big Tech companies are simply too big and too powerful and that conservatives must get behind efforts to cut their control over Americans.

[Vance] will make that happen.?
Former Trump administration official Ric Grenell, a one-time supporter of Moreno, suggested he too is fully behind Vance now that Trump has endorsed him.

The Left will ignore this because Blackrock has committed to racial audits and other diversity BS.?
The Ohio Republican Senate primary election is set for May 3.
Theres only one candidate in the OH GOP senate primary that is pretty much guaranteed to win the general, and that candidate is America First warrior JD Vance.
He was an incredible fighter for hard working Americans in the White House, he will be again, and I'll fight for the America First Agenda in the Senate.
He was an incredible fighter for hard working Americans in the White House, he will be again, and Ill fight for the America First Agenda in the Senate.

Trump made the right choice endorsing JD Vance- hell be excellent in the Senate https://t.co/E6RGlrk6oI
DJT nails it with this one, big time.
As we have seen [Tim Ryan] is a shallow, useless, and tired career D.C. bureaucrat who has done nothing for the people he was paid to serve.

Those should be at least three separate companies.?
Amazon controls the entire modern hardware infrastructure of the Internet.
Christopher Rufo of the Manhattan Institute called Trumps endorsement of Vance a big moment? for the Republican Party.
Blackrock is pursuing an investment strategy that will make it harder for young Americans to own homes,? Vance wrote.
